disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Center of the Universe.

blurb.value: Innate: Stars orbit Aurelion Sol, dealing magic damage when they hit an enemy. Additionally, beyond them exists an Outer Limit affecting his other abilities.

description.value: Innate: Aurelion Sol is constantly orbited by three Stars, each doing a full circumference in 5.25 seconds, and beyond them exists an Outer Limit affecting his damaging abilities.

description2.value: The Stars deal 12 − 120 (based on level) (+ 5 / 10 / 15 / 20 / 25 (based on Celestial Expansion's Rank) (+ 25% AP) magic damage to enemies that come in contact with them as well as execute enemy minions that have less than  25 health, including if they are brought to or below that threshold.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * The Stars orbit counterclockwise around Aurelion Sol. Aurelion Sol's Stars have independent vision hitboxes, meaning that they may remain visible even while he is within a brush, and must be in the brush themselves in order to be hidden. In addition to not being considered to be projectiles for interception purposes, it is possible that his Stars are considered champion summoned units. An individual Star must complete at least one third of its orbit before it can damage the same target again. In the event that an enemy orbits around Aurelion Sol at the same rate as his Stars without leaving their hitbox, they will take damage once every third of the way around.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Starsurge.

blurb.value: Active: Aurelion Sol creates an expanding disk, which explodes to stun and deal magic damage to enemies when it reaches the Outer Limit.

description.value: Active: Aurelion Sol fires the core of a newborn star in the target direction, which expands as long as it remains within the Outer Limit and grants him  20% bonus movement speed. Starsurge can be recast after 0.25 seconds.

description2.value: Upon traveling beyond the Outer Limit, the core detonates, dealing magic damage to all enemies caught within and stunning them for a duration, increased by 0% − 300% (based on time traveled).

leveling2.value: Magic Damage:70 / 110 / 150 / 190 / 230 (+ 65% AP)Minimum Stun Duration:»0.55 / 0.6 / 0.65 / 0.7 / 0.75«Maximum Stun Duration:2.2 / 2.4 / 2.6 / 2.8 / 3

description3.value: Recast: Aurelion Sol detonates the core early.

description4.value: If Aurelion Sol is faster than the missile, the missile speed will increase to keep up.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: *The initial cast count as an ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as Spellblade, charging Spellbinder, and stacking Force Pulse. Detonating the ability manually does not. So long as Aurelion Sol manages to keep Starsurge within the Outer Limit, it will continue to expand until detonated or out of range, giving this ability the largest range and radius of any ability in the game. Starsurge's size grows by 36.67 units per second.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Celestial Expansion.

blurb.value: Passive: The star's base damage passively increased.

blurb2.value: Active: Aurelion Sol pushes his stars to the Outer Limit, increasing their damage for a short time. When it ends, he gains bonus movement speed for a short time.

description.value: Passive: The Stars' base damage is increased.

description2.value: Active: Aurelion Sol expands his Stars out to the Outer Limit, rotating them at a high but decaying speed, and increasing their total damage by 40%. Celestial Expansion can be recast after 1 second.

description3.value: After 3 seconds or immediately after casting Comet of Legend, the stars retract and Aurelion Sol gains 40% bonus movement speed, decaying over 1.5 seconds.

description4.value: Recast: Aurelion Sol commands the stars to retract early.

description5.value: Celestial Expansion's recast can be used while affected by crowd control.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * The initial cast counts as an ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as Spellblade, charging Spellbinder, and stacking Force Pulse. Deactivating the ability manually does not.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Comet of Legend.

blurb.value: Active: Aurelion Sol takes off flying for a long distance.

description.value: Active: Aurelion Sol pulls in his Stars and takes flight in the chosen direction. While in flight, Aurelion Sol is ghosted, has unobstructed vision, ignores terrain collision, and sets his movement speed to a static amount. Immobilizing effects interrupt the flight. Comet of Legend can be recast after 1.5 seconds.

description2.value: If Aurelion Sol takes damage from enemy champions or turrets, Comet of Legend ends instantly and is placed on a 4 second  static cooldown.

description3.value: Recast: Aurelion Sol ends Comet of Legend early.

description4.value: The spot at which the flight will reach maximum range is highlighted to Aurelion Sol during Comet of Legend.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Aurelion Sol cannot enter terrain that does not have an open space on the other side (e.g. the edges of the map). PENDING FOR TEST: Polymorph interrupts Comet of Legend. Max range indicator The following table refers for interactions during Comet of Legend: Attacking Disabled for the first 1.5 seconds, interrupts afterwards. Abilities Starsurge is usable. Celestial Expansion and Voice of Light are disabled. Movement Disabled for the first 1.5 seconds, interrupts afterwards. Items Usable All the other item-actives are usable Disabled N/A Interrupted by Stopwatch Zhonya's Hourglass Hextech Protobelt-01 Consumables Usable Spells Usable Barrier Clarity Cleanse Exhaust Ghost Heal Ignite Smite Mark Disabled Hexflash Interrupted by Flash Teleport Recall Dash Interrupted by Damaging effectsDeath Grounding effects Immobilizing effects
notes.description: Disabled for the first 1.5 seconds, interrupts afterwards.

flavorsound.value: "They call me a comet. They call me a dragon. They have no words for my true form."

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Voice of Light.

blurb.value: Active: Aurelion Sol projects a blast of pure star fire, dealing magic damage and slowing all enemies caught in it. Close enemies are also knocked back to the Outer Limit.

description.value: Active: Aurelion Sol exhales a wave of star fire in a line in the target direction, dealing magic damage to all enemies hit, slowing them for 2 seconds and knocking them back to the Outer Limit if they are within.

description2.value: Aurelion Sol channels over 0.3 seconds until the star fire reaches maximum range. Voice of Light cannot be interrupted by crowd control.

description3.value: Celestial Expansion can be cast during Voice of Light.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Voice of Light is cast from wherever Aurelion Sol is at the end of the cast time.
